comment.author: 67012890@N05
comment._content: The Adelaide Club, North Terrace, Adelaide www.adelaide-club.asn.au/enter.aspx maps.google.com.au/maps?q=The+Adelaide+Club,+North+Terrac...

comment.author: 92601516@N02
comment._content:
The male bastion Adelaide Club remains however the buildings to the left have been demolished and replaced with 1920-50 structures. Some of the buildings were redeveloped in 1970-80s with their facades retained. 
For gender balance, the female bastion Queen Adelaide Club is further along on the corner of the next block and, like the Adelaide Club, is an older two-storey building.
